DOC.brief_summary: Compare daily vs demand treatment men erectile dysfunction . Treatment mild moderate erectile dysfunction 10 mg vardenafil p.o . 24 week + 4 week wash-out : A : daily bedtime 12 week follow 12 week placebo B : daily bedtime 24 weeksC : PRN 24 week
DOC.brief_title: Sustainable Efficacy Vardenafil OD Versus Vardenafil PRN Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Males 1864 year age Mild mild moderate ED ( define > 15 < 21 score point accord Erectile Function Domain Score IIEF assess randomisation visit ) History least one follow condition : Diabetes mellitus type 2 , hypertension , peripheral arterial occlusive disease Stable , heterosexual relationship six month Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate therapy .
